p: In this study, the addition of LEO and MEO essential oils did not influence feed intake and body weight changes during the trial period. In agreement, Nasiri‐Moghaddam, Hassanabadi, and Bidar ( 2012) reported that there was no difference in feed intake values between broilers fed control and those fed lavender essence (350 mg/kg) at the period of 22–42 days age.
